definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: swallow or swift (cypselus, Tristr:FFP 82 ff.) (Targum [[סוּסָיׇא]] Is 38:14);—as twittering Is 38:14 (in sim.); LXX xelidw/n, Vulgate pullus hirundinis;; so Je 8:7 Kt (Qr [[סִיס]] wrongly; perhaps to distinguish from foll., so Gie), LXX id., Vulgate hirundo.
